name: Mother's Defense
description:
Learn what it is like to be be a mother in the unforgiving world.
- Survive 3 unique and unpredictable days -
- Keep eggs in momma protected zone -
- Sun is the timer for the day -

For every egg hatched you will see what kind of Mother you are!


I am trying to start a small business selling my sculptures. Creating a small interactive game seemed like a good way to engage consumers to relate to the Mother Quail. I developed the game entirely in Construct 3. It was a huge challenge but I learned soo much. All of the art, animation, sound, music and most of the coding was done by me. It took about 3-4 months of work. 

Programs Used
Construct 3 - Procreate - Launchpad - Photoshop - Audacity


"mother quail" in Hungarian is one in a line of birds I plan on selling.


Lobiio.com

Buy Anya Fürj here
